tooltip.item.mounts_whistle.mounts_whist:
Right-Click a mount to tame it
Right-Click in air to spawn-despawn your mount
Shift + Right-Click to toggle Auto-Ride
message.mounts_whistle.no_mounts_bound: Whistle has not a mounts bound
message.mounts_whistle.whistle_already_b: This whistle is already bound to a mount
